mapper.select: select * from ( select rownum rn, reviewList.* from ( select review_idx, review.member_idx, review.content, review_date, review_status, reviewfile_name, answer_content, answer_date, item.item_idx from review join purchase on review.purchase_idx = purchase.purchase_idx join item on purchase.item_idx = item.item_idx where item.item_idx = #{itemIdx}) reviewList) where rn between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
